definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Her singing sometimes sonorous, powerful, sometimes soft lyrical.
sentences.chinese: 她的演唱時而鏗鏘有力，時而柔美抒情。

sentences.english: And a touch of femininity, such as a bow headband can be added to tone down the masculinity.
sentences.chinese: 也可以使用束髮帶之類的飾品來增加女生的柔美。

sentences.english: The music for the dance is soft and beautiful, which matches the theme and style of the dance perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 這段配曲柔美極了，很符合整個舞蹈的主題風格。

sentences.english: Soft and delicate one paragraph chiffon skirt.
sentences.chinese: 柔美而精緻的一款雪紡裙。

sentences.english: It combines wildness and gentleness so that you are unable to reject it at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 野性與柔美兼具一身，讓你在一眼就欲罷不能。

sentences.english: Conclusion Yirou beautiful white clean face emulsion has the efficacy of …
sentences.chinese: 結論伊柔美白潔面乳具有清潔皮膚作用。

sentences.english: The delicateness and details of the flower are maximized.
sentences.chinese: 鮮花的柔美和細節得到最大化。

sentences.english: Traditionally girly styles are made even more feminine with theaddition of this fun print.
sentences.chinese: 這些趣味十足的印花將傳統的柔美風格發揚光大。

sentences.english: Is the silk guilder soft satin still romantic lace facings of soft United States?
sentences.chinese: 是柔美的絲質軟緞還是浪漫的蕾絲面料？

sentences.english: The melody, pure and understated, unfolds softly and pleasingly .
sentences.chinese: 作品的旋律舒展柔美，委婉質樸。

sentences.english: So snow-white hair, makes every become pure but fine in winter.
sentences.chinese: 云云潔白的頭髮，使每個冬天都變得純潔而柔美。

sentences.english: It was almost as if the poor animal were starved for the sound of gentle words.
sentences.chinese: 那就好像是一個可憐的動物渴望聽到柔美的語言。

sentences.english: The taste of happiness, such as light and soft, smoky fire bright. It tastes, from within …
sentences.chinese: 幸福的味道，如燈光柔美，如煙火燦爛。

sentences.english: The scenery is very beautiful in the small islands in the Pacific Oceans.
sentences.chinese: 承平洋上一些小島的景色十分柔美。

sentences.english: Pillowed upon a fair and happy breast.
sentences.chinese: 一頭枕着柔美而幸福的胸脯。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb
